nodes.text: During the Nikardun campaigns, Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet undertook a mission to the planet Rapacc, the homeworld of the Paccosh species, to investigate the remnants of Nikardun forces in the Choas. While there, Thrawn and Caregiver Thalias encountered their old friend Uingali foar Marocsaa, who told them of a group of 200 refugees who had settled on Rapacc. Thrawn and Thalias had previously met Uingali aboard a mining station in the system six months prior, during their mission to the Rapacc system.

Thrawn and Thalias met the refugees and their leader, known only as the Magys, who sought suicide for her people so they could join "The Great Beyond." Thrawn was okay with the Magys committing suicide, but Thalias objected strongly. Thalias sought to prove that hope remained for the Magys' people on their homeworld, which led to a mission to that planet which became a battle.

During the mission, Thrawn returned the Marocsaa subclan ring bearing a chimaera that Uingali had entrusted him with. Thrawn and Thalias also saw a chimaera painted on the hull of a Nikardun blockade frigate that Uingali had captured.
